title: 03/29/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/29/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Albert Breer who joins us from the NFL Coaches meeting. Will the OT rule be altered? Kelly Slater joins to discuss being at the Oscars and getting a tip from Tom Brady that he was going to return. And Nick Wright shares details about a dinner he had with DP recently.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Albert Breer who joins us from the NFL Coaches meeting. Will the OT rule be altered? Kelly Slater joins to discuss being at the Oscars and getting a tip from Tom Brady that he was going to return. And Nick Wright shares details about a dinner he had with DP recently.
